verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:14
verses.text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus, and shall present us with you.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:15
verses.text: For all things are for your sakes, that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:16
verses.text: For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish, yet the inward man is renewed day by day.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 4:17
verses.text: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory;
